name: jade-orb
effect: Causes rayquaza to appear in the embedded tower.
short_effect: Summons Rayquaza to the Embedded Tower.

flavor_text.black_white: A shiny green orb that is said to have a legend and has a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A shiny green orb that is said to have a legend and has a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
